title: Here Comes Harry
description: Another great illustrated ebook for teens from Beebliome Books!With bitterness in his heart, Harry Rushden, the thirteen year old lord of Two Mile manor, comes to London to serve his apprenticeship with a master goldsmith, for he had set his heart on following his father's footsteps in becoming a knight, serving his king, Edward VI, known as Harry. But he finds a way to be of valuable service to his king, as the story of the two Harrys paints a vivid picture of court and London life in the fifteenth century.Recommended for readers 12 and above.
author: Hilda Lewis
